text.text: THE SHANGHAIEXHIBITION HALL IS THEDESIGNATED SHOPINGCENTRE OF THE FIRSTEAST ASIAN GAMES.
上海展览馆是第一届东亚运动会指定的购物中心。
A: Where did you buyyour silk shirt?
你的真丝衬衫是在什么地方买的?
B:　I bought it at theshanghai Exhibition Hall.
A:　Where?　At theShanghai Exhibition Hall?
什么地方?在上海展览馆?
B:　 Yes.　 TheShanghai Exhibition Hall isthe designated shoppingcentre of the First EastAsian Games.
对。上海展览馆是第一届东亚运动会指定的购物中心。
